org.springframework.cache.interceptor

类 CachePutOperation.Builder

  • java.lang.Object

    public static class CachePutOperation.Builder
extends CacheOperation.Builder
    A builder that can be used to create a CachePutOperation.

        protected java.lang.StringBuilder getOperationDescription()

        Return an identifying description for this caching operation.

        Available to subclasses, for inclusion in their toString() result.
